summary: Completed backend API testing for Erebus Protocol. All backend endpoints are functional with 100% test success rate. Treasury wallet generation and Solana integration working correctly. Frontend has expected ESM module compilation issues.

compilation_errors.issue: ESM module resolution errors with @solana/web3.js, axios, react-router
compilation_errors.details: Multiple ENOENT errors for .mjs files and process/browser polyfill issues
compilation_errors.note: Complex webpack5 polyfill issues beyond MVP scope as noted by main agent

passed_tests: Root API endpoint returns correct message
Treasury address endpoint returns valid Solana address
Balance endpoint fetches SOL balance correctly
Invalid address handling returns proper 400 error
Treasury wallet validation with correct private key
